website_summaries.verdict: This pretty stoneware vase has eye-catching colors that compliment the hues of your favorite blooms as well as your artistic decor.
pros: Stands out from the pack with its eclectic-looking design that goes nicely with "artsy" decor
Glazed graphics that are situated on unglazed background pop with color
Tear-shaped design holds a decent amount of water to keep cut flowers fresh
cons: Somewhat pricey for the size, as it measures just 4.75 by 5.75 inches

customer_reviews.title: In love with nowhouse!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful is an I understatement! Was so excited to see an amazon version, affordable and even better than the pricier line I have at home. After this piece, I was hooked and even got the decorative box for my bathroom, and the mirrored jewelery box. Every decor piece from this line comes with a thousand compliments!!! A must have for small and big apartments and homes. I can tell the designer is not typical Jonathan Adler decor, but I have to say I’m even more pleased with some of the pottery in now house than his more expensive line- which I own a lot of!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and colorful
customer_reviews.text: I saw this vase used in a magazine that I receive and liked the colors so much that I ordered it. The price was higher than I thought it was worth, but I had a gift card that helped make it more in line with what I was willing to pay. It looks nice in my home and the colors are attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Piece
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled to own a Jonathan Adler design. I've been a little obsessed with terazzo lately, and seeing this design on Amazon got me pretty excited. It's a simple little vase but the colors are gorgeous and it's way cooler than a plain, solid colored one. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna K.

customer_reviews.title: Jonathan Adler must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and classic. I thought it was going to be slightly bigger. Colors are true to screen. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dugan

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest little vase. It brightens my entire window.
customer_reviews.author: JanneH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the quality versus price. I expected more from Jonathan Adler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Vase
customer_reviews.text: This case is so pretty that I just added a single green stem and it’s a table centerpiece! I got a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisamarie C. DiPeppe

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: a little pricy and small but so cute! exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Would have looked even nicer as a larger vase.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty vase. It is shipped in a well-protected box. I personally think it would have looked even nicer as a larger-size vase (ie., 12"+). It's a little too small to be a focal piece. It looks good on a shelf. I sat in in several spots in my house, and it just looked small. I finally ended up placing it on our entertainment center (with other similar/smaller sized items) and it looks nice there.
customer_reviews.author: MomtoBoys

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Vase
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple vase. It is 5.5” high & about 4” diameter (at the widest part). It is not really high quality – the line between the teal green base & the colorful part is a little uneven. But it is really cute & has that mid-century modern look. The colors are as shown in the Amazon photo. Black, teal, yellow/gold, light pink, aqua green, periwinkle blue on a creamy, white base.
customer_reviews.author: Katawampas

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is cute. The colors are great. Its a sagey teal on the bottom with mint, black, pink, mustard, and periwinkle flakes on top. It has a 50s speckled vinyl flooring look - in a good way. The description says this this is for a bold bouquet, although the opening is about the size of a dime. Only a stem or two will fit in here. With all the colors going on, it can stand alone.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Fresh & Lovely
customer_reviews.text: this is a beautiful vase. Well made it features a bright vibrant pink on the top and a colorful pattern on the bottom. It is perfect as a vase or just as art. It puts a smile on my face every time I see it. The finish is flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Antigone Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Vase
customer_reviews.text: Combined with the other items in this collection this vase serves as an awesome piece for any end table of bookshelf that would have items fitting in with the color scheme. I found the quality is great and it looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan A. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous Vase that adds a special element to any room. Stable and doesnt tilt over if a table is accidentally bumped Came shipped in good packaging that it isnt cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan A. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Our little girl likes this on her desk. She has put colored pencils in it, though they sink below the top. She just looks in for the color she wants. She liked the style of this right away.
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Cool retro vase
customer_reviews.text: Very cool colorful retro vase. Nicely matches other Now House ceramics. Now I need more flat surfaces in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Technology Guy

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Lovely Vase
customer_reviews.text: The Now House by Jonathan Adler Terrazzo Droplet Vase is definitely chic with a one-of-a-kind look and artistic edge. In fact, it is the kind of speckled stoneware piece that you would find at a local artisan market. The colors are as interesting as the creation itself. The mouth is tiny. The entire vase measures 4.75" x 5.75", so it will only hold one or two cut flowers. I display my vase on the entrance landing of our stairway, and although I showcase a few other artifacts on the landing, this vase stands out the most. It also makes a unique gift for that special person on your list.
customer_reviews.author: Ohstacy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design and colors
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful piece. I love the colors and the design. It looks good with small bouquets, like tulips, roses, lilies. The vase is small but sturdy. The design is very attractive and it looks amazing in my living room. Colors are light pink, blue, aqua, mustard and some black to make a nice contrast. I LOVE my vase.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely companion piece to a larger matching vase. The color is light and cheerful - it definitely adds a touch of happy to any space. The vase is well made, heavy weight, and not prone to tipping. The set makes a particularly nice wedding gift. Very pleased with this!
customer_reviews.author: OutlawPoet

customer_reviews.title: Earthy and Colorful
customer_reviews.text: This Terrazzo globe vase is cute and elegant at the same time, it gives this simple/basic yet also chic vibe. I really like this vase, it makes a very nice addition to the table (whether there are flowers in it or not, this can still be used as a nice house decoration piece). Overall this is a pretty vase, and I like the earthy and colorful feel of it.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Striking
customer_reviews.text: This vase is very striking and immediately noticeable. The color/pattern is bright and cheery - this adds some light to your decor. It's well made. Very heavy and stable. While fragile, I don't worry about it tipping. Finally, it just adds that perfect Jonathan Adler Happy style!
customer_reviews.author: OutlawPoet
